alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 14 at 5:44AM EDT until April 14 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Rush. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 543 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated minor flooding is already occurring along the Flatrock River upstream of Rushville. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Flatrock River upstream of Rushville is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. This includes the following streams and drainages... Ben Davis Creek, Flatrock River, Little Blue River, North Fork Shawnee Creek, Shawnee Creek, Shankatank Creek, North Branch Turkey Creek, Little Flatrock River and Conns Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glenwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
